name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, sauté onions and garlic, add ground beef, and cook until browned. Mix with tomato sauce and serve over spaghetti.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken breast and slice. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing, add chicken, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
